name: Siebel: Avoid undocumented Business Components
description: This rule list all Business Components with no comments
output: This rule reports undocumented Business Components
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code.
remediation: Add comments into Business Components to explain what is their goal and how they work.
total: Number of added or modified Business Components

qualityStandards.name: Missing Documentation for Design
qualityStandards.description: The product does not have documentation that represents how it is designed.
